data.thought: S35|H|S32|Educational Phenotype F3: 'Concept Visualizer'. Abstract concept (recursion, closures, async) â†’ notebook generates interactive visualization. Container runs progressive examples. Observatory shows: mental model building, step-by-step execution, state changes. Thoughtbox: explains each step, anticipates confusion, provides analogies.
